com.ibm.webest.gui.action
Class SolutionAction

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.webest.gui.action.SolutionAction

public class SolutionAction
extends java.lang.Object

Managed bean to handle solution selection.
Also holds selected solution after selection.

Author:
Florian Friedrichs, Gregor Schumm, Dirk Kohlweyer
